definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: This month Iran arrested several more bloggers.
sentences.chinese: 本月伊朗又逮捕了多名博主。

sentences.english: Truth is the key to success for any blogger.
sentences.chinese: 真實是每一個博主成功的鑰匙。

sentences.english: Zhiping should be the blogger who shows most interests in English that I've ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 志萍應該是我見過所有博主裏對英語最執着的一位。

sentences.english: Like, say, music journalists or music bloggers. Ahem.
sentences.chinese: 比如說，音樂記者或是個音樂博客的博主。

sentences.english: These might be the work of enthusiasts, practitioners or academics.
sentences.chinese: 這些博主可能是熱心工作人士，從業人員或者學者。
我現在正式是一名博主。

sentences.english: European bloggers embed even more music videos than the rest of the world.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲博主比世界其他地方的博主上傳更多的音樂視頻。

sentences.english: Howard asked me to be one of those dozen bloggers.
sentences.chinese: 霍華德邀請我成爲這十幾個博主的一員。

sentences.english: The Shanghai blogger Uln already has an idea.
sentences.chinese: 上海博主Uln已經有了好主意。

sentences.english: A history teacher in Charlottesville, Virginia, Levin also maintains the popular blog, Civil War Memory.
sentences.chinese: 萊文還是知名博客“內戰記憶”的博主。

sentences.english: Tom is a noted finance author and blogger.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是著名的金融怍家和博主。

sentences.english: Some bloggers on Sina's popular Twitter-like Weibo microblogging service raved about the vice premier's English capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 新浪微博的一些博主熱情讚揚李克強的英語能力。

sentences.english: Megan is a student blogger for the Food Studies feature on GOOD's Food hub.
sentences.chinese: 梅根是GOOD食品頻道的學生博主。
巴林一名博主被嚴刑拷打。

definition: Zhihu, Chinese Q&A website modeled on Quora, at zhihu.com, launched in Jan 2011
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
(Internet slang) to recommend a product to sb
to take a picture or video of oneself/to take a selfie/selfie
